articles.title: Inside Out 2 Surpasses Dune: Part 2 as Highest-Grossing Movie of 2024 So Far - IGN
articles.description: Inside Out 2 has surpassed Dune: Part 2 to become the highest-grossing movie of 2024, and it only took eight days to secure that title at the U.S. box office.
articles.content:
Inside Out 2 has surpassed Dune: Part 2 to become the highest-grossing movie of 2024, and it only took eight days to secure that title at the U.S. box office.

articles.title: Meg Bellamy: Trolls told me I was too fat to play Kate Middleton, says The Crown star - BBC.com
articles.description: Meg Bellamy says she was trolled online while playing the future Princess of Wales in The Crown.
articles.content:
Meg Bellamy, who played a young Catherine Middleton in Netflix drama The Crown, has said she was told by internet trolls she was "too fat" for the role.
